general.name: id
general.desc: Unique product identifier. Use only letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), underscores (_), dashes (-), and periods (.). Max 50 characters.

general.name: title
general.desc: Product name. Should be clear, descriptive, and match what appears on your landing page. Max 150 characters recommended.

general.name: description
general.desc: Product description in plain text (no HTML). Include key details like features, materials, dimensions. Max 5,000 characters.

general.name: link
general.desc: Landing page URL (must use https://). Should link directly to the product page where users can purchase.

general.name: image_link
general.desc: URL of the main product image (must use https://). Image should be at least 100x100 pixels, show product clearly against plain background.

general.name: availability
general.desc: Stock status: in_stock, out_of_stock, preorder, or backorder.

general.name: price
general.desc: Product price with currency. Format: 'amount ISO_currency' (e.g., '15.00 USD'). Must match landing page price.

general.name: brand
general.desc: Brand name. Required if GTIN is not provided. Must be combined with mpn.

general.name: gtin
general.desc: Global Trade Item Number (UPC, EAN, JAN, ISBN). Required if brand+mpn not provided. Must have valid checksum.

general.name: mpn
general.desc: Manufacturer Part Number. Required with brand if GTIN is not provided.

general.name: availability_date
general.desc: Date when preorder/backorder item will be available. Required when availability is 'preorder'. Format: YYYY-MM-DD (ISO 8601).

general.name: google_product_category
general.desc: Google's product taxonomy. Use category ID or full path (e.g., '166' or 'Apparel & Accessories > Clothing').

general.name: condition
general.desc: Product condition: new, refurbished, or used. Defaults to 'new' if not specified.

general.name: age_group
general.desc: Target age group: newborn, infant, toddler, kids, or adult. Important for apparel, toys.

general.name: color
general.desc: Primary color(s) of the product. Use common color names. Can include multiple colors separated by '/'.

general.name: gender
general.desc: Target gender: male, female, or unisex. Important for apparel, fragrances, accessories.

general.name: size
general.desc: Product size (e.g., 'S', 'M', 'L', '32x34', '10.5'). Important for apparel, shoes.

general.name: size_type
general.desc: Size type for apparel: regular, petite, plus, big_and_tall, or maternity.

general.name: size_system
general.desc: Sizing standard: US, UK, EU, DE, FR, JP, CN, IT, BR, MEX, or AU.

general.name: product_type
general.desc: Your product category hierarchy (e.g., 'Home & Garden > Kitchen > Appliances').

general.name: additional_image_link
general.desc: Additional product images (comma or pipe separated URLs). Max 10 additional images.

general.name: item_group_id
general.desc: Common ID for product variants (different colors/sizes of same item). All variants should share the same item_group_id.

general.name: mobile_link
general.desc: Mobile-optimized URL if different from main link. Must use https://.

general.name: sale_price
general.desc: Discounted price. Format: 'amount ISO_currency'. Must be lower than price.

general.name: sale_price_effective_date
general.desc: When sale price is active. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD/YYYY-MM-DD' or ISO 8601 datetime range.

general.name: material
general.desc: Material or fabric (e.g., 'leather', '100% cotton', 'stainless steel').

general.name: pattern
general.desc: Pattern or graphic print (e.g., 'striped', 'floral', 'solid').

general.name: product_detail
general.desc: Additional product details as structured data. Format: 'section_name:attribute_name:attribute_value'.

general.name: product_highlight
general.desc: Key product features or benefits. Can include up to 10 highlights, each max 150 characters.

general.name: multipack
general.desc: Number of identical items sold together (e.g., 6 for a 6-pack). Must be integer ≥ 2.

general.name: is_bundle
general.desc: Whether product is a bundle of different items. Values: true or false.

general.name: adult
general.desc: Whether product is adult-oriented. Values: true or false. Required for adult products.

general.name: energy_efficiency_class
general.desc: Energy efficiency rating (e.g., 'A+++', 'A++', 'A+', 'A', 'B', 'C', 'D'). Switzerland, Norway, UK only.

general.name: min_energy_efficiency_class
general.desc: Minimum energy efficiency class on the label. Switzerland, Norway, UK only.

general.name: max_energy_efficiency_class
general.desc: Maximum energy efficiency class on the label. Switzerland, Norway, UK only.

general.name: certification
general.desc: Product certifications (e.g., 'EC:EPREL:123456'). Required for certain products in EU/EFTA/UK.

general.name: shipping
general.desc: Shipping cost override. Format: 'country:service:price' (e.g., 'US:Standard:5.99 USD').

general.name: shipping_label
general.desc: Shipping label for grouping products with similar shipping costs.

general.name: shipping_weight
general.desc: Product weight for shipping. Format: 'number unit' (e.g., '1.5 lb', '0.7 kg').

general.name: shipping_length
general.desc: Package length. Format: 'number unit' (e.g., '12 in', '30 cm').

general.name: shipping_width
general.desc: Package width. Format: 'number unit'.

general.name: shipping_height
general.desc: Package height. Format: 'number unit'.

general.name: max_handling_time
general.desc: Maximum days between order and shipment. Integer ≥ 0.

general.name: min_handling_time
general.desc: Minimum days between order and shipment. Integer ≥ 0.

general.name: tax
general.desc: Tax rule override. Format: 'country:region:rate:tax_ship' (e.g., 'US:CA:8.25:yes').

general.name: tax_category
general.desc: Tax category for grouping products with similar tax rules.

general.name: custom_label_0
general.desc: Custom label for organizing campaigns. Max 100 characters.

general.name: custom_label_1
general.desc: Custom label for organizing campaigns. Max 100 characters.

general.name: custom_label_2
general.desc: Custom label for organizing campaigns. Max 100 characters.

general.name: custom_label_3
general.desc: Custom label for organizing campaigns. Max 100 characters.

general.name: custom_label_4
general.desc: Custom label for organizing campaigns. Max 100 characters.

general.name: promotion_id
general.desc: Promotion identifier to associate product with a promotion. Max 50 characters.

general.name: identifier_exists
general.desc: Set to 'false' only if brand, mpn, and gtin genuinely don't exist. Values: true or false.

general.name: expiration_date
general.desc: When product listing expires. Format: YYYY-MM-DD (ISO 8601).

general.name: unit_pricing_measure
general.desc: Amount of product for unit pricing (e.g., '100 ml', '1 kg'). Required in some countries.

general.name: unit_pricing_base_measure
general.desc: Base measure for unit pricing (e.g., '100 ml'). Required with unit_pricing_measure.

general.name: installment
general.desc: Installment payment option. Format: 'months:amount currency:downpayment'.

general.name: subscription_cost
general.desc: Subscription cost details. Format: 'period:period_length:amount currency'.

general.name: loyalty_program
general.desc: Loyalty program details. Format: 'program_label:tier_label:price'. Australia, Japan, UK, Germany, France, Canada, Mexico, Brazil, US only.

general.name: cost_of_goods_sold
general.desc: Cost of goods sold. Format: 'amount ISO_currency' (e.g., '23.00 USD').

general.name: auto_pricing_min_price
general.desc: Minimum price for automated discounts. Format: 'amount ISO_currency'.

general.name: product_length
general.desc: Product length. Format: 'number unit' (e.g., '20 in'). Supported units: cm, in.

general.name: product_width
general.desc: Product width. Format: 'number unit'. Supported units: cm, in.

general.name: product_height
general.desc: Product height. Format: 'number unit'. Supported units: cm, in.

general.name: product_weight
general.desc: Product weight. Format: 'number unit' (e.g., '3.5 lb'). Supported units: lb, oz, g, kg.

general.name: ads_redirect
general.desc: URL for ad redirects with additional parameters. Max 2000 characters.

general.name: excluded_destination
general.desc: Destinations to exclude (e.g., 'Shopping_ads', 'Display_ads', 'Buy_on_Google_listings').

general.name: included_destination
general.desc: Destinations to include (e.g., 'Shopping_ads', 'Free_listings', 'YouTube_Shopping').

general.name: shopping_ads_excluded_country
general.desc: Countries to exclude from Shopping ads. 2-character ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.

general.name: pause
general.desc: Pause product for all ads. Value: 'ads'. Max pause: 14 days.

general.name: external_seller_id
general.desc: External seller identifier for marketplaces. Max 50 characters.

general.name: lifestyle_image_link
general.desc: Lifestyle image URL for browsy surfaces. Max 2000 characters.

general.name: virtual_model_link
general.desc: 3D model URL (.gltf or .glb file, max 15MB). US only.

general.name: structured_title
general.desc: Title with AI generation metadata. Use for titles created with generative AI.

general.name: structured_description
general.desc: Description with AI generation metadata. Use for descriptions created with generative AI.

general.name: short_title
general.desc: Short product name for Demand Gen ads. Max 150 characters (recommended: 5-65).

general.name: carrier_shipping
general.desc: Carrier-specific shipping services. Format: 'country:postal_code:carrier:handling_time:transit_time'.

general.name: ships_from_country
general.desc: Country from which product ships. 2-character ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.

general.name: shipping_transit_business_days
general.desc: Transit business days (e.g., 'Mon-Fri;Sun' or 'US:Mon-Sat').

general.name: shipping_handling_business_days
general.desc: Handling business days (e.g., 'Mon-Fri;U'). Defaults to Mon-Sat.

general.name: free_shipping_threshold
general.desc: Order cost above which shipping is free. Format: 'country:price' (e.g., 'US:16.00 USD').

general.name: maximum_retail_price
general.desc: Maximum retail price. India only. Format: 'amount ISO_currency'.

apparel.name: id
apparel.desc: Unique variant ID. Each color/size combination needs its own ID. Max 50 characters.

apparel.name: title
apparel.desc: Product title. Include distinguishing features like color, style, fit. Max 150 characters.

apparel.name: description
apparel.desc: Product description in plain text. Include materials, care instructions, fit details. Max 5,000 characters.

apparel.name: link
apparel.desc: Variant product URL (must use https://).

apparel.name: image_link
apparel.desc: Variant's main image URL (must use https://). Show product clearly on plain background.

apparel.name: availability
apparel.desc: Stock status: in_stock, out_of_stock, preorder, or backorder.

apparel.name: price
apparel.desc: Variant price. Format: 'amount ISO_currency' (e.g., '15.00 USD').

apparel.name: item_group_id
apparel.desc: Groups color/size variants under one parent. Use parent SKU.

apparel.name: gender
apparel.desc: male, female, or unisex. Required for most apparel categories.

apparel.name: age_group
apparel.desc: newborn, infant, toddler, kids, or adult. Required for apparel.

apparel.name: color
apparel.desc: Primary color (e.g., 'Red', 'Navy Blue'). Separate multiple colors with '/'. Max 100 characters.

apparel.name: size
apparel.desc: Variant size (e.g., 'S', 'M', '32x34', '10.5'). Required for clothing and shoes. Max 100 characters.

apparel.name: brand
apparel.desc: Brand name. Required if GTIN is missing. Combine with mpn.

apparel.name: gtin
apparel.desc: Variant-level GTIN with valid GS1 checksum (UPC, EAN, JAN).

apparel.name: mpn
apparel.desc: Manufacturer Part Number for this variant. Required with brand if GTIN missing.

apparel.name: availability_date
apparel.desc: Required when availability is 'preorder'. Format: YYYY-MM-DD (ISO 8601).

apparel.name: google_product_category
apparel.desc: GMC taxonomy ID or path (e.g., '1604' or 'Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Shirts').

apparel.name: size_system
apparel.desc: Sizing system: US, UK, EU, DE, FR, JP, CN, IT, BR, MEX, or AU.

apparel.name: condition
apparel.desc: new, refurbished, or used. Defaults to 'new'.

apparel.name: product_type
apparel.desc: Your category hierarchy (e.g., 'Women > Dresses > Maxi Dresses'). Max 750 characters.

apparel.name: size_type
apparel.desc: regular, petite, plus, maternity, big, or tall. Can submit up to 2 values.

apparel.name: material
apparel.desc: Fabric or composition (e.g., '100% cotton', 'leather'). Max 200 characters.

apparel.name: pattern
apparel.desc: Pattern/graphic (e.g., 'plaid', 'striped', 'floral'). Max 100 characters.

apparel.name: additional_image_link
apparel.desc: Extra angles or on-model images. Max 10 URLs, comma/pipe separated.

apparel.name: sale_price
apparel.desc: Variant sale price. Format: 'amount ISO_currency'. Must be lower than price.

apparel.name: sale_price_effective_date
apparel.desc: When sale price applies. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD/YYYY-MM-DD' or ISO 8601 datetime range.

apparel.name: mobile_link
apparel.desc: Mobile-optimized URL if different from link.

apparel.name: product_detail
apparel.desc: Technical specs (e.g., 'Fabric:Weight:5.8 oz'). Max 140 chars per section.

apparel.name: product_highlight
apparel.desc: Key features (2-100 highlights). Max 150 characters each.

apparel.name: shipping
apparel.desc: Shipping cost override. Format: 'country:service:price'.

apparel.name: shipping_weight
apparel.desc: Weight for shipping calculations. Format: 'number unit'.

apparel.name: tax
apparel.desc: Tax rule override. Format: 'country:region:rate:tax_ship'.
